p: We collected patientsâ€™ baseline and demographic characteristics as part of standard clinical care. During the first visit, a complete blood count, liver function tests, HBV/HCV, HIV serology, quantitative serum HCV RNA levels and HCV genotyping were determined using standard commercial assays. We also recorded all treatment medications, HCV treatment plans, all visits to our center, treatment completion data and SVR12 testing results.
